title: Had Pbe account for 15 days and it's gone
body: I've only had pbe for so little time and now the account itself is completely gone please help!

replies.body: same thing has happened to me, except I had my account a lot longer than 15 days, had it for almost a year now ;/

I looked into this and wasn't able to find PBE tied to the account you're posting from.  I suggest hitting us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team can help with recovering your PBE account if it's attached to a different account that you own.  We'll get back to you asap!
